name: Test Execution Statistics
query:
SELECT tr.test_suite AS 'Test Suite',
       dtr.total_tr AS 'Total Test Cases:Int',
       dtrp.passed_tr AS 'Passed Test Cases:Int',
       dtrf.failed_tr AS 'Failed Test Cases:Int',
	((dtrp.passed_tr/dtr.total_tr)*100) as 'Percentage Passed:Percent'
FROM `tabTest Result` tr
INNER JOIN `tabTest Suite` ts ON ts.name=tr.test_suite
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT count(trs.name) AS 'total_tr',
          trs.test_suite
   FROM `tabTest Result` trs
   GROUP BY trs.test_suite) dtr ON dtr.test_suite=tr.test_suite
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT count(trp.name) AS 'passed_tr',
          trp.test_suite
   FROM `tabTest Result` trp
   WHERE trp.test_case_status='Passed'
   GROUP BY trp.test_suite) dtrp ON dtrp.test_suite=tr.test_suite
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT count(trf.name) AS 'failed_tr',
          trf.test_suite
   FROM `tabTest Result` trf
   WHERE trf.test_case_status='Failed'
   GROUP BY trf.test_suite) dtrf ON dtrf.test_suite=tr.test_suite
WHERE ts.app_name=%(app_name)s
GROUP BY tr.test_suite
